Smart Power Strip with AI-Powered Energy Management: Create a power strip that is equipped with artificial intelligence (AI) technology to monitor and manage the energy consumption of connected devices. The power strip can detect when devices are in standby mode and automatically cut off power to them to save energy. It can also learn the usage patterns of devices and adjust energy usage accordingly. Confidence Score: 0.8

Power Strip with Built-In Charging Coils: Design a power strip with built-in charging coils that can charge devices wirelessly. This would eliminate the need for tangled cords and make charging devices more convenient. The power strip can also have a built-in charging dock for easy device docking. Confidence Score: 0.9

Customizable Power Strip with Interchangeable Outlets: Create a power strip that allows users to interchange the outlets to fit their specific needs. Users can purchase additional outlets with different configurations, such as USB ports, to accommodate their devices. This would provide a versatile and convenient power solution for a variety of devices. Confidence Score: 0.8

Power Strip with Built-In Surge Protection: Design a power strip with built-in surge protection to protect devices from power surges and spikes. This would provide an added layer of protection for devices and prevent damage from power fluctuations. Confidence Score: 0.9

Motion-Sensing Power Strip with Automatic On/Off: Create a power strip that uses motion sensors to automatically turn on and off. When a device is placed near the power strip, it will turn on, and when the device is moved away, it will turn off. This would save energy by eliminating standby power consumption and provide a convenient solution for devices that need to be turned on and off frequently. Confidence Score: 0.9
